title: 137: Finding the perfect RB fit and how Doug Whaley built the Bills
itunes:title: 137: Finding the perfect RB fit and how Doug Whaley built the Bills
description:
Former NFL scouts Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks dig into the nuggets when analyzing the NFL this week. Buffalo Bills general manager Doug Whaley also joins the show to discuss how he’s built his team. The duo also breaks down what teams look for in a running back and rundown the upcoming slate of college football contests.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
